General.Name: StoryTel AB
General.Description: Storytel AB (publ) provides audiobooks and e-books streaming services. It operates through three segments: Streaming Nordics, Streaming Non-Nordics, and Books. The company offers a subscription-based service for audiobooks and e-books under the Storytel and Mofibo brands, as well as through Audiobooks.com. It also publishes audiobooks primarily through the publisher, StorySide; physical books through Norstedts, Printz Publishing, Rabén & Sjögren, B. Wahlströms, Lind & Co, People's, Gummerus, and Aula & Co. publishing houses; and children's books through Rabén & Sjögren publishers. It operates in Sweden, Denmark, the United States, Finland, the Netherlands, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

5.Name: Mr. Andreas  Lindblom
5.Title: Head of Financial Planning & Analysis and Investor Relations
